annotation_sentence: Ah, I chose because, um, I want to learn how to, like, manage company and people. I think it is very important skill.
rationale: The word 'it' refers to the skill of managing a company and people.

annotation_sentence: I, um, I was leader. I organize meeting and, uh, make sure everyone do their part. Also, I present it in class.
rationale: The word 'it' refers to the business plan or project that was presented in class.

annotation_sentence: We have problem with finance part. It was hard, but we ask professor for help and, um, research more. Finally, we find good solution.
rationale: The word 'It' refers to the finance part of the project.

annotation_sentence: I like your company because, um, it is global. I want to work with different culture and, uh, learn more about international business.
rationale: The word 'it' refers to the company being discussed.

annotation_sentence: I think it is important to, um, listen careful and respect other ideas. I always try to understand, uh, different view.
rationale: The word 'it' refers to the importance of listening carefully and respecting other ideas.

annotation_sentence: Yes, in university, we make, um, marketing plan for real company. Our plan was, uh, chosen by company, and they use it. It was great success.
rationale: The word 'it' refers to the marketing plan that was used by the company.
